title: Correction: Time of day is associated with paradoxical reductions in global signal fluctuation and functional connectivity
fullText:
There is an error in Figs 4 and 6, S5 and S7. The colours of two labels (Limbic A & Limbic B) are swapped in the legends of the cortical atlas (see Fig 4). Limbic A should refer to brain regions in the temporal lobes shown in the brighter colour, while Limbic B should refer to regions in the orbitofrontal cortex shown in the darker colour. The authors have provided corrected versions here.
